website_summaries.verdict: Decorative, ergonomically designed, open five-toed yoga socks that deliver a skid-free practice.
pros: Received top marks for grip and fabric quality
Exotic patterned grip designed to provide more grip where needed in different poses
Made from naturally anti-bacterial bamboo fiber with a breathable weave that keeps feet dry and comfy
100% money-back guarantee within first 90 days of purchase
Designed for both men and women
cons: Not ideal for larger sized feet
Toe holes are uncomfortably small for some

customer_reviews.title: I love these yoga socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these yoga socks! So comfortable and so warm, I can wear them all day, every day during the workout. I have size 7 feet and the socks fit perfectly with enough stretch and space for larger sizes of feet. I will recommend these socks to anyone. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: momo

customer_reviews.title: These socks work great for me when I’m practicing yoga at home and ...
customer_reviews.text: These socks work great for me when I’m practicing yoga at home and perfectly fit on me. Before I ordered these socks, I was a bit worried about the uncomfortable feeling of the individual open toe spaces, but actually they are very comfortable and feel like grab your toes to get more balance and strength during your posing. I tried a few different versions of yoga socks before and they are easily lost their fit or shrink after washing and drying but these socks stay their fit and flexibility after washing. The design is also cool and I like the exotic pattern which functions great as well. Highly recommend these socks.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisha M

customer_reviews.title: but this is the best ones I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a bunch of yoga socks, but this is the best ones I have ever bought. Perfect grip for stability when doing different poses. it says the fabric has bamboo fibers in them and I think its got something do to with making perfect fit on my feet. Love the open toe design and the art work on the bottom. Definitely 5-star recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Yoonie

customer_reviews.title: Great grip Great comfort
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly! My feet stayed warm and I still felt connected to my mat. I will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect yoga sock! Love it! Very comfortable fits like a glove. I will be ordering a couple more pairs again. Thanks for the great product!
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Breedlove

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from face-planting
customer_reviews.text: As a sweaty person let alone yogi, these have saved me from more than a few slips on my mat. They fit great and look cute, plus I feel safer, can't beat that!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Sock It To Me!
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks. What I like the most is that they cover the entire top of the feet. They are also very cool looking on the bottom. I washed them for the first time by placing them in a small laundry sack designed for "delicates" and line dried them...they came out great. My only wish is that they came in more colors. I will be buying more if they do.
customer_reviews.author: patricia a scott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for size 5 to 6 small feet
customer_reviews.text: If you have small feet size 5 - 5.5 - 6 these fit well and stay in place while practicing. The bamboo is soft and more comfortable than cotton in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gift for someone who is into Yoga@
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colors and the fit. Will probably order again. Nice support for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gear!
customer_reviews.text: This socks perfectly grips well my feet and really helpful during whole working out. After I just used this for my balance ball exercise and figured out this would be great for all the floor activity like yoga and pilates as well. I definitely buy again and recommend this socks for the professionals as well as beginners too.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: While I have not tried them yet. The socks appear to be of good quality and pretty. I will wear them to Pilate classes.
customer_reviews.author: Pynk

customer_reviews.title: No slip socks
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect. I love the weight and texture of the fabric. The no slip bottom is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kye Fox

customer_reviews.title: Yes they are more expensive but look and feel so good on. I truly believe that you get what ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to decide which yoga socks to purchase for almost three weeks. I was about to purchase a 4 multipack yoga sock set when I saw someone wearing Ellaste. Yes they are more expensive but look and feel so good on. I truly believe that you get what you pay for and super happy with my selection
customer_reviews.author: Miss Conceived

customer_reviews.title: All Good!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is as expected, and they are great at their job of keeping my from being a slip n' slide on my mat/floor!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney A

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for those winter days when the studio might be a bit cool. Having slots for the toes didn't bother me at all.

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect! Great grips to prevent slipping
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect! Great grips to prevent slipping! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne G.

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: These socks are super cute with lots of designs on them. They keep my toes separated nicely

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have large feet (size10) but these are comfortable. Snazzy colors,too.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Thin, narrow toe openings, return costs over half the purchase price.
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, and the toe openings were not large enough for my big toes. I have never had that issue with socks like these before, super bizarre. I wanted to return, but it costs 5.99 to do so, so it's not really worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: They are not as sturdy as expected and after you wash them they shrink a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Cute socks but very heavy material.
customer_reviews.text: The socks are very well made but the material seems very thick and heavy. I will wear them but not my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am new to yoga and absolutely in love with it so far
customer_reviews.text: I am new to yoga and absolutely in love with it so far, however I have also suffered from sweaty palms and feet. These yoga socks really help me from slipping and get a good grip! Plus they're comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Kiara

customer_reviews.title: Prevent slipping and falling
customer_reviews.text: Great grippers for cardio barre and Pilates. Give yourself 5 extra minutes to pull your toes into the little sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying these socks. I was afraid they would not fit as I have wide and long feet (size 9). But they fit very well. I haven't washed them yet but I think they will become more soft. They are very breathable and have good grip.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Speirs

customer_reviews.title: I love these grip socks!
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality grip socks! I use them for exercise class. Strong, comfortable material. I loved them so much I bought 3 more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B

customer_reviews.title: Pilates noob
customer_reviews.text: Just started reformer Pilates in November and these socks are great. They're sticky and snug. My favorite socks.
customer_reviews.author: V. Lucci

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enough for beginners/ intermediate yoga practice. Machine washable and dryable. Won't shrink.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the socks but the cuts of the toes should be a little more shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Vue

customer_reviews.title: My gf loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend needed a new pair of yoga socks and I bought this product for her. She really liked these because they fit perfectly and the grip is very strong. She says the bottom part is pretty but provides enough friction that enables her to perform different poses. She's thinking of getting another pair as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful detail on yoga socks
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful detail on these special light weight yoga socks, no slip.
customer_reviews.author: Big Jellyfish

customer_reviews.title: Love love this
customer_reviews.text: Love love this. I bought Nike yoga shoes that sometimes get too tight if I retain water in my feet
customer_reviews.author: s bruner

customer_reviews.title: These socks are comfortable and grip very well
customer_reviews.text: These socks are comfortable and grip very well, but without a bumpy sensation. After years of scrunching toes together into shoes, my toes and feet feel better with a little separation and this separation enables my whole foot to offer better support.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T

customer_reviews.title: Good Price & good product
customer_reviews.text: Product came quickly, and fits very well. (Size 9/Men) I wear it during my work outs at home. The grip on the bottom helps in a non-carpeted areas and can substitue your socks.
customer_reviews.author: Sung Jun Choi

customer_reviews.title: Yoga/pedicure footies
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product! Great for getting pedicures in the winter! Ladies in the shop were awed. Tech put on socks just before polish and my tootsies stay toasty and nails stay smudge-free❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them they are a perfect fit and breathe well
customer_reviews.author: Anton Jerbic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: socks are great, have a good grip and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Sonnenanbeter

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great grip! Much better than anything else I’ve tried. Made the mistake of walking on the carpenter in my two pet home so my best suggestion is keep it restricted to just the yoga mat or hard floor. Wondering what the best way to clean them is though.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but between the toes takes some getting used to. Excellent grip

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to get them promptly and that the yoga socks are of good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had discovered this earlier. Now I can easily hold a tree pose comfortably!

customer_reviews.title: Must have for me!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite! Get so many complements on these. Perfect for yoga

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and offers great grip! Keep my feet warm on cool mornings in my home. Easy to put on. Love them!

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and very comfortable. I would recommend these yoga socks to anyone wanting to get more out of their yoga practices

customer_reviews.title: DEFINITELY WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my taekwondo class, since I did not like walking on the mat barefoot. The first time I tried on these socks, I could immediately feel the difference. These socks are very practical and very fashionable that I highly recommend to utilize this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is beyond fantastic!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: "I'm really excited about these socks. As soon as I received them I ran to my yoga class to try them out. They are fashionable, comfortable, and practical at the same time. My feet don't sweat, and I know for sure that I now have a good grip on my feet. I am feeling fresh and clean after my exercise too"
customer_reviews.author: heejounglee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome socks
customer_reviews.text: Love how they feel and love the design. Arrived just as shipping time stated. Couldn't be happier.

customer_reviews.title: Superb Yoga Socks
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how beautiful these socks are AND the fit perfect.

customer_reviews.title: A hole already...
customer_reviews.text: Super bummed because I really like these! I've used them less than 10 times & they already have a hole in them.

customer_reviews.title: Balance is everything
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit! I feel more connect to my feet. I feel stronger in my posses. My balance has improved.
customer_reviews.author: Ramie

customer_reviews.title: very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this product. I initially bought these for my at-home workout / stretches. These socks have really good grip on the bottom and doesn't slip off at all. I wear 7.5 shoes and they really feel like 2nd skin. Definitely will be wearing them for my yoga classes as well!
customer_reviews.author: Joon C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks !!! Exactly as marketed ! I even wear them just lounging around!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and comfy! I'm a size 9-9.5 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great socks -- hold me in place during yoga postures ...
customer_reviews.text: Great socks -- hold me in place during yoga postures & keeps my feet toasty so I can keep practicing all winter.
customer_reviews.author: MsMer

customer_reviews.title: The socks have a firm grip while these make me feel comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the firm grip of these socks. I've never had anything like these before. After I started doing Yoga and Pilates at home, I slipped out quite often, but these socks are a perfect solution for my exercise. And,these are so comfortable too. I highly recommend these socks.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Johnson

customer_reviews.title: So perfect.. worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these for when I work out because I had absolutely no traction on my floor at all, and my feet would hurt so much every time. At first I thought they were a little expensive, but they have totally been worth it. The socks are super comfortable and the grips are perfect - enough traction but not bumpy at all. They have been awesome not only for yoga but also for whatever exercise I do at home (usually cardio that involves a lot of jumping). Anyways, I like everything about them and I would totally recommend them to anyone for any kind of workout. The cute design is a plus, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great for keeping me steady on my mat during my vinyasa yoga class. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: MMcGeorge

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks
customer_reviews.text: I liked the socks but I wish the tor holes were bigger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have small feet (size 5) and the small size fits perfectly. I will be ordering another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hate them.
customer_reviews.text: Hate them.. when you try to do a Yoga pose, the socks cut in between your toes making it unbearable....had to stop and take them off. Thought OK, I'll try them on my hands for hand grips, Same Thing!!! cuts between your fingers, It HURTS!! Love the style and color, but not for Yoga.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wilder

customer_reviews.title: I love these socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks. They keep me from slipping on my yoga mat and they don't twist during different positions. They are so comfortable. I plan to get more. 😃
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying these yoga socks. Like that the back does not slip off the heel. Traction is very good and will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks, they feel amazing on my feet!
customer_reviews.author: Erica miller

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have narrow ankles these fit amazing! They don’t loose shape and stay on!! Love them
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON customer

customer_reviews.title: Feel great
customer_reviews.text: They feel very soft on my feet, will order more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: EXCEEDED MY EXPECTATIONS
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! They allow your feet to remain cool and dry during exercise and are especially superior if you have ever suffered from toenail fungus. They also help me maintain my balance while using my rebounder. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Peba

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping my feet warm in the beginning of ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping my feet warm in the beginning of the class and then to keep me from slipping on the mat as I get a bit warmer (and sweatier). Helps also to keep a steady balance and I'm thrilled by the cute design.
customer_reviews.author: danbee

customer_reviews.title: Nonslip
customer_reviews.text: I kept sliding on my yoga mat. Not anymore! Fit well, cute, affordable, nice follow-up email from the company with yoga tips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: With having the toes the socks stay in place better
customer_reviews.author: Susan McNamee

customer_reviews.title: Love my yoga socks
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I hate wearing shoes when I work out so these are great for exercising on my wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna & Rick

customer_reviews.title: I also like how the grips on the bottom work well on ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried the toe spaces might be uncomfortable but the material is soft and stretchy so it isn't a problem at all. I also like how the grips on the bottom work well on my yoga mat and yet they are thin. I would recommend it to anyone who likes to do yoga because it has a cool design and it's made out of a very nice, soft material. It's definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Huh

customer_reviews.title: Now all you need are some happy
customer_reviews.text: They stayed put. I do pilates and a lot of the socks let my feet slide right out. Now all you need are some happy colors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the firm grips on the bottom of the socks
customer_reviews.text: I love the firm grips on the bottom of the socks. Fits very well and love the details of the socks also. Definitely recommend to others!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for large feet
customer_reviews.text: These are not for large feet (size 9 1/2). They cut into your toes and get painful rather quickly. However they are good quality, stop you from slipping. I would recommend them for people with smaller feet.
customer_reviews.author: MNGRRRL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome non-slip yoga socks!!
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited when I got my Ellaste yoga socks in the mail!! They fit perfectly & super comfy. I like that my toes are able to breathe, & the low-ankle design is nice. The nonslip pads at the bottom help me stay in place & keep my feet from slipping or sliding around on my mat; also helps me with the one leg poses (i.e. tree pose). I also like the heel tab for added support. Overall super happy with Ellaste yoga socks...I'm ready to get my yoga on!!
customer_reviews.author: Lina Yim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice, already have worn it to Pilates, works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit in the toes is a little tight but okay. It takes practice to get them on correctly.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous in Texas

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful so far they're very sturdy around the toe area ...
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful so far they're very sturdy around the toe area does get a little stringy. Other than that it's really no big deal they are amazing for what you need them to do and wonderful for Pilates yoga I will be purchasing them again I prefer to get them in a size luckily it came in a small medium might wear a size 5 and they're what when I ordered it there was no size ordering so I just ordered it in hopes that it would fit and it fit fairly well I'd like it may be a little more snug. Grateful
customer_reviews.author: LuminousStarFish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fit!! My feet don't slide anymore in my yoga poses. Fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toesox are better
customer_reviews.text: I have another pair similar to these that are the Toesox brand which I like so much more. The material that these ones are made of gets pills and the threads around the toes fray a lot. The material also doesn't feel like it fits snug around my foot like the Toesox brand does. This material seems to get stretched out during my workout and doesn't stay in place like I want it to. I recommend the Toesox brand over these.
customer_reviews.author: JessieMay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect product that i was looking for. Definitely recommend to others!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: jacky

customer_reviews.title: look great, felt awful.
customer_reviews.text: These look beautiful but the toe separators cut very painfully into my feet. I stopped my workout to adjust them (move the separators up on the toe), but as soon as I started moving again, they ended up cutting into the spaces between my toes. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: eloisebig

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little tight around my pudgy toes. Also a bit roomy for yoga socks.
customer_reviews.author: MarquessaX ^_^

customer_reviews.title: Good socks for yoga
customer_reviews.text: Good socks for yoga, I tested them in class. They are very grippy and don't come off my feet. However I was wishing that the toe holes weren't there.. it's just strange and I didn't have my toes painted.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great for barre
customer_reviews.text: I bought these socks to use at barre class and found them to be a good quality and comfortable. Putting them on was a little difficult due to separate toes but overall these socks are great value.
customer_reviews.author: mi_mutter

customer_reviews.title: Needs more room
customer_reviews.text: It is a good sock but the toe area should be a little wider. When you are doing your yoga and pilates, the sock slides backward making the fit against the toes too snug. Otherwise, good feel.
customer_reviews.author: Cobra69

customer_reviews.title: OK for now
customer_reviews.text: They help keep my feet from sliding around, but they tend to slide in between your toes and it can really hurt. I am currently looking for a product that will suit my needs better then these did
customer_reviews.author: Buska2161

customer_reviews.title: Just too big.
customer_reviews.text: I like these, I really do, but they are so big. I wear a size 6 shoes and these slip around on my feet when trying to do yoga. The toes actually almost completely cover my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Comfy From the First Try!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I ordered yoga socks and I wasn't sure what to expect. Well, as soon as the Ellaste socks arrived, I put them on and didn't want to take them off! They're very well made, the material is nice and soft, and the fit is great. I liked them so much that I ordered a second pair! Let me know if you have any promotions in the future. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Tsai

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: very cute socks but my foot is a 5 to 5.5 socks seemed a bit loose. Is slip resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Reenie

customer_reviews.title: Nice but defective when they arrived.
customer_reviews.text: They seem like a nice quality product but mine came with a hole in them. I don't have time or the desire to package them up and ship them back and reorder.
customer_reviews.author: D. Greig

customer_reviews.title: The socks do keep you from slipping on the mat ...
customer_reviews.text: The socks do keep you from slipping on the mat but my foot still slips in the sock. Because these are toe socks, when the socks moves on the foot it cuts the circulation off on the toes. FYI, returning is available, but at your expense!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Very unsatisfactory!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed!! Frayed 1st time wore, before washed!!! Definitely not worth the price!!!

customer_reviews.title: Yoga socks
customer_reviews.text: The material is thick enough to hold its shape but it feels very soft
customer_reviews.author: Tifany A  Monzon

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love the socks they’re a bit tight around the toes.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased less expensive socks with a better fit elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Toes were too tight to accommodate certain yoga poses. Purchased less expensive socks with a better fit elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Busymum

product_meta.title: Ellaste Open Toe Yoga Socks - Non Slip Half Toe Sock with Anti Skid Grip for Yoga Pilates Barre: for Women Girl (Black, Small/Medium (Women 5.5-8.5 / Men 4.5-7.5))
feature_bullets: MAXIMIZE YOUR PERFORMANCE FOR EVERY WORKOUT – The Ellaste Socks’ stylish anti-slip sole is ergonomically designed to contour the natural shape of your foot and guarantees a firm grip which allows you to push yourself when it really matters. Remove all distractions and fully concentrate on your performance with peace of mind.

FEEL THE DIFFERENCE OF STRONG AND COMFORTABLE GRIP - Yoga socks usually have dotted skid grips that put prickly pressure on the sole of your foot. Or have decorative skids that are flatter but do not cover enough surface area to offer a strong grip. The flat and comfortable skids of Ellaste yoga socks cover a wide surface area to provide a strong grip.

EMBRACES YOUR FEET LIKE SECOND SKIN – The Ellaste Performance Yoga Socks are made with smooth bamboo fiber for their elasticity and snug fit. The Ellaste Yoga Socks offer a firm fit for a wide-range of feet sizes (Women 5~12, Men 4~11) with supreme elasticity. Performance can also come with extra comfort.

STAY FRESH WITH HIGH BREATHABILITY – With its unique textile weave and naturally bamboo fiber, the Ellaste Yoga Socks easily absorbs and evaporates sweat, keeping your feet dry. Just because you sweat doesn't mean you can't keep fresh.
FOR YOUR PEACEFUL YOGA MOMENT – Don't waste your precious yoga moment. Ellaste is here for you to have full grip on your soles so that all you have to focus is to enjoy your moment with peace of mind
